name: Ancient Battle: Rome Lite
description:
Designed from the ground up Ancient Battle: Rome Lite gives a unique wargaming experience on iPhone and iPad. Use Roman legionaries, elephants, catapults, heavy and light cavalry, archers, slingers, fanatics and many other unit types to engage in classic battles.  

The full version of the game was the No.1 strategy game in the App store in 8 countries and reviews of the full edition included:

"Hunted Cow’s best wargame yet" - Pocket Tactics ,

"delivers everything one can expect from a strategy title" - Arcade Sushi  ,

"smart, challenging, and surprisingly substantial strategy game" - Pocket Gamer

  Included in the Lite edition is 6 mission tutorial campaign culminating in the break out from the siege of Alesia, and the first 5 missions from the full game campaign between Julius Caesar and Pompey the Great, including the battle of Pharsalus.     

Key Game Features:

 ● High Definition Ancient Era Graphics.
● 7 Mission Tutorial Campaign.  
● 5 Mission Italia Campaign playable as Caesar or as Pompey.
● 26 Unique Ancient Units.
 ● Detailed Combat Analysis 
● Flank Attacks
 ● Hours of Gameplay.
● Game Center Achievements and Leaderboards.
 ● Universal App (Works on iPhone & iPad)
